data.persona: I govern my country.  I am well respected.  My wife is called a queen.
data.description:
You are in the Cemetery.
The cemetery is a brooding ground with dark colors and low light. The grounds smell of water and are constantly damp. Rain falls upon the cemetery often.
There's a rusty gate and a Gravestone here.
The groundskeeper and the queen are here.

You are carrying a shield, an armor, and a sword, and wearing a crown.

data.short_motivation: i want to help the groundskeeper clean the cemetery
data.mid_motivation: i want the cemetery to be pristine and respectable
data.long_motivation: i want to honor the dead and prevent my kingdom from hauntings

timeline.label: 10 minutes ago
timeline.action: drink ale with the queen as we mourn a death

timeline.label: 15 minutes from now
timeline.action: put trash from cemetery on bin
